comment: As a band director its a 5/5, but as a teacher in the classroom a 3/5. I'm not a fan in the classroom. His attendance and grading policies are too aggressive. Homework isn't difficult, but it can be time consuming.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: This mans is my favorite band director. He's so funny in class and picks exciting music for the group, though it's sometimes too hard for some musicians. I'm probably not going to take university band again just because of how late the class is, but I loved having his class and I'm excited to have him in marching band next semester!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: 10/10 band instructor, understands that life happens alongside his class so he's willing to excuse absences. Very funny and personable. Only thing I wish he would have done is cater the difficulty of the music a little better to the ability level of the class; some members of the band never seemed to get parts of the music.

The key to getting an A is showing up. The music isn't difficult at all and it's just a really nice class in general. Dr. Scheivert is SO funny and is really understanding if you can't make it to a class. Excited to be taking him again next semester!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring
